title.en: Prayer for the Fulfilment of Aspirations

text.en: You make the path that combines emptiness and compassion grow clearer and clearer,
Lord of the teachings and beings in the Snowy Land of Tibet,
text.en-trans: ché cher saldzé gangchen ten drö gön

text.en: To you, the Lotus Holder Tenzin Gyatso,
text.en-trans: chak na pemo tendzin gyatso la

text.en: We pray: may all your wishes be spontaneously fulfilled!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so zhedön lhündrub shok
